definition: horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: She wore a sexy see-through blouse to the cocktail party.
sentences.chinese: 她穿一件性感透明的上衣去參加雞尾酒會。

sentences.english: Contraste Bar features a range of tapas paired with cocktails and an international beer list.
sentences.chinese: 對比各種tapas搭配雞尾酒和國際啤酒名單。
我要一杯馬丁尼雞尾酒。

sentences.english: Offer a signature cocktail instead of an open bar.
sentences.chinese: 提供簽名雞尾酒會而非免費酒吧。

sentences.english: Fruity-bitter cocktail based on rum, original and different.
sentences.chinese: 朗姆味的水果苦酒雞尾酒，原創的，與衆不同的。

sentences.english: Thought to be the ancestor of todays popular Bramble cocktail.
sentences.chinese: 被認爲是當今流行樹莓類雞尾酒的鼻祖。

sentences.english: If light rum and lime juice are used then the cocktail becomes a DAIQUIRI.
sentences.chinese: 如果加入淡朗姆酒和萊姆汁雞尾酒酒成爲了黛克瑞。

sentences.english: Spice up the blues with this anti-depressant.
sentences.chinese: 用這款雞尾酒抗擊抑鬱。

sentences.english: Serve in a cocktail glass and garnish with coconut flakes.
sentences.chinese: 過濾，倒入一個雞尾酒杯中，用椰蓉裝飾。

sentences.english: In Paris, cocktail parties offer good opportunities for making friends.
sentences.chinese: 在巴黎，雞尾酒會是廣交朋友的好機會。

sentences.english: Snake Bite, England. A cocktail made from cider and lager beer.
sentences.chinese: 產自英格蘭，一種用蘋果酒和大杯啤酒製成的雞尾酒。
雞尾酒療法也有併發症。

sentences.english: Shake over ice, and strain into chilled cocktail glasses.
sentences.chinese: 與冰混合，攪拌，之後倒入冰動後的雞尾酒杯。

sentences.english: But the thing that gets you hooked on the whole vaporous cocktail is nicotine.
sentences.chinese: 但是讓你沉迷於這種“氣體雞尾酒”的是尼古丁。

sentences.english: Any cocktail or liqueur served over shaved ice.
sentences.chinese: 可用任何雞尾酒加冰屑。

sentences.english: They took possession. As if they were at a cocktail reception.
sentences.chinese: 他們佔據了舞臺，他們恍如就在雞尾酒會的接待入口。

definition: to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
to taste a small amount/to sample
